role.argrole: group that has a lot of members

example.parse: ( (IP (IP (IP-SBJ (NP-SBJ (NN 炎黄子孙)) (VP (VV 人多势众))) (VP (VC 是) (NP-PRD (QP (CLP (M 个))) (NP (NN 原因))))) (PU ，) (IP (IP-SBJ (NP-SBJ (NN 生活)) (VP (VRD (VV 好) (VV 起来)) (AS 了))) (VP (ADVP (AD 也)) (VP (VC 是) (NP-PRD (QP (CLP (M 个))) (NP (NN 原因)))))) (PU 。)))
